module.name: alias_identification
module.purpose:
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of alias identifications assigned to product or activity data.
This edition incorporates modifications to the previous edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been modified:
ai_identification_item and alias_identification_item merged into one alias_identification_item.
In addition, modifications have been made to the mapping specification, the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.

inscope.li: assignment of an alias identifier to product or activity data;
items within the scope of application module Identification assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1021.

uof.name: Alias_Identification
uof.description: The Alias_Identification UoF specifies the data structure needed to represent the assignment of alias identifiers to product or activity data.

bibitem.stdtitle: Industrial automation systems and integration — Product data representation and exchange — Part 1013: Application module: Person organization assignment
